mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(orderNumber, '') orderNumber, ifnull(charge, '') charge, ifnull(business, '') business, ifnull(o1.orderId, '') orderId, ifnull(cooperationStatus, '') cooperationStatus, ifnull(moneySituation, '') moneySituation, ifnull(serviceProject, '') serviceProject, ifnull(linkMan, '') linkMan, ifnull(phoneNumber, '') phoneNumber, ifnull(serviceStatus, '') serviceStatus, ifnull(district, '') district, ifnull(c1.customerId, '') customerId, ifnull(`name`, '') name, ifnull(r1.Id, '') Id, ifnull(orderDate, '') orderDate, ifnull(email, '') email FROM `order` o1 LEFT JOIN res_orderCustomer r1 ON o1.orderId = r1.orderId LEFT JOIN customer c1 ON r1.customerId = c1.customerId
